Title: Can't Beat Fluffy
Description:
Poor Theramus. I have an idea to cheer him up!

Take this net to catch some of the native hoppers, which are docile but quick. They've made quite a home by the coast.

We'll bring them to Theramus. He'll literally be overrun with fluffy goodness!
RewardText: So! Many! Hoppers! Let's pet them all!
